column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Atmosphere: jinya is great for groups
column5: and late night food! It's very versatile. There are booths for two people
column7: a ramen bar at the back
column8: and the middle has two giant communal tables for groups of varying sizes. Â The lighting is kind of dim
column9: which is fine but sometimes at night the lightbulb above the booths get a little too dim and you can't quite read your menu. The servers are generally friendly
column12: and understanding. They do get busy maybe around 7pm especially on weekend nights
column13: so go early or call ahead and ask!
